body_html:
@meteorcloudy Hooray for the Bazel presubmit for Windows!

With this PR and #18303, tfcompile can be built out-of-the-box with the follow command:

bazel build --config=opt --config=monolithic --copt=/DNOGDI --host_copt=/DNOGDI //tensorflow/compiler/aot:tfcompile

We can discuss about setting up the XLA build later in the tracking bug.
body_text:
@meteorcloudy Hooray for the Bazel presubmit for Windows!
With this PR and #18303, tfcompile can be built out-of-the-box with the follow command:
bazel build --config=opt --config=monolithic --copt=/DNOGDI --host_copt=/DNOGDI //tensorflow/compiler/aot:tfcompile
We can discuss about setting up the XLA build later in the tracking bug.
body:
@meteorcloudy Hooray for the Bazel presubmit for Windows!

With this PR and #18303, `tfcompile` can be built out-of-the-box with the follow command:

`bazel build --config=opt --config=monolithic --copt=/DNOGDI --host_copt=/DNOGDI //tensorflow/compiler/aot:tfcompile`

We can discuss about setting up the XLA build later in the tracking bug.
